document_data.name: Order of Thaumaturgists
document_data.mainbody: The '''Order of Thaumaturgists''' was a collection of [[wizard]]s who worshiped [[Karsus]], the Momentary God.
document_data.Activities: Many of these wizards researched new [[spell]]s after [[Mystryl]]'s fall and the ensuing change in the nature of [[magic]]. Some of their ancient [[tome]]s could still be found within the ruins of towers in the [[Dire Wood]].
document_data.Members: Every wizard within the Order was also part of the [[Cult of Karsus]].
